function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of isolation and loneliness due to remote work and telecommuting practices","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and social well-being of employees","Mitigation":"Implement virtual team-building activities and regular check-ins to maintain a sense of community","Technologies":"Virtual team-building platforms, video conferencing tools","People":"Employees in the construction sector","Owner":"Construction company leaders and HR teams"},{"Description":"Rise of new technologies for real-time tracking of employee health and COVID-19 symptoms","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, potential misuse of health data","Mitigation":"Ensure strict privacy policies and consent for health data tracking, transparent communication with employees about the use of tracking technologies","Technologies":"Health tracking apps, employee health monitoring systems","People":"Employees in the construction sector","Owner":"Construction company leaders and IT teams"},{"Description":"Integration of remote management applications and technologies","Impact":"Increased reliance on technology could lead to decreased human interaction and communication","Mitigation":"Encourage in-person interactions where possible, promote balanced use of technology for communication and management","Technologies":"Remote management platforms, building information modeling (BIM) tools","People":"Employees, managers, and project teams in the construction industry","Owner":"Construction company leaders and project managers"}]}
